type.description: There are five types of buttons: secondary buttons, primary buttons, dotted box buttons, linear buttons, and text buttons.
type.description_zh: 按钮的类型，分为五种：次要按钮、主要按钮、虚框按钮、线性按钮、文字按钮。

long.description: Whether the width of the button is adaptive to the container.
long.description_zh: 按钮的宽度是否随容器自适应。

loading.description: Check whether the button is loading
loading.description_zh: 按钮是否为加载中状态

disabled.description: button whether or not to disable

html-type.description: Set the original type attribute of the button, and the optional value refers to the HTML standard
html-type.description_zh: 设置 button 的原生 type 属性，可选值参考 HTML标准

href.description: Set up a jump link. When this property is set, the button renders as a label.
href.description_zh: 设置跳转链接。设置此属性时，按钮渲染为a标签。

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when the button is clicked
